com.upsight.android.marketing

Class UpsightBillboard

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.upsight.android.marketing.UpsightBillboard
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Billboard

    public abstract class UpsightBillboard
extends java.lang.Object
    A billboard eligible for receiving marketing content.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  UpsightBillboard.AttachParameters
      Parameters for attaching marketing content to an UpsightBillboard.
      static class  UpsightBillboard.Dimensions
      Preferred dimensions for the marketing content view.
      static interface  UpsightBillboard.Handler
      The interface that must be implemented to handle callbacks associated with an UpsightBillboard.
      static class  UpsightBillboard.PresentationStyle
      Preferred presentation styles for the marketing content view.

    • Method Detail

      • create

        public static UpsightBillboard create(UpsightContext upsight,
                                      java.lang.String scope,
                                      UpsightBillboard.Handler handler)
                               throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException,
                                      java.lang.IllegalStateException
        Creates and registers a new UpsightBillboard.
        Parameters:
        upsight - The com.upsight.android.UpsightContext.
        scope - The scope associated with the UpsightBillboard. This is an all lower-case alpha-numeric string that may also contain underscores, used for targeting of marketing content from the Upsight Dashboard.
        handler - The UpsightBillboard.Handler to handle billboard callbacks.
        Returns:
        A new UpsightBillboard.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - The scope and handler must be non-null and non-empty.
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - An active UpsightBillboard with the same scope already exists. A billboard remains active until either a content view is attached, or destroy() is called.

      • setUp

        protected abstract UpsightBillboard setUp(UpsightContext upsight)
                                   throws java.lang.IllegalStateException
        Sets up the UpsightBillboard.
        Parameters:
        upsight - The com.upsight.android.UpsightContext.
        Returns:
        The registered UpsightBillboard.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - An active UpsightBillboard with the same scope already exists. A billboard remains active until either a content view is attached, or destroy() is called.

      • destroy

        public abstract void destroy()
        Destroys this UpsightBillboard by clearing all internal references, which makes it no longer eligible to receive marketing content. This ensures its UpsightBillboard.Handler.onAttach(String). will never be invoked after destroy() returns.

        This call has no effect if a marketing content has already been attached via UpsightBillboard.Handler.onAttach(String). in which case you must wait until UpsightBillboard.Handler.onDetach() is called for the billboard to be cleared of internal references.
